item.title: Delete specific events from Google Calendar series
item.description: Snippet Run it Manifest Delete specific events from Google Calendar series Note: For bulk operations please use Google Calendar API Batch Requests. See: Sending Batch Requests | Calendar API | Google Developers, tanaikech/BatchRequest: This is a library for running Batch Requests using Google Apps Script (GAS). Snippet See full code Leave a comment Create script from the snippet  *See how to use scrviz for clone Apps Script project index.js /** * * Deletes only specific events from series that match by date and search term * Retuns affected events * * @param {string} calendarId * @param {Date} start * @param {Date} end * @param {string} search * @returns {GoogleAppsScript.

item.title: To clear all events from a Google Calendar
item.description: Snippet Manifest Clear all events from a Calendar Snippet See full code Leave a comment Create script from the snippet  *See how to use scrviz for clone Apps Script project index.js /** * On Homepage event trigger * * @param {GoogleAppsScript.Addons.EventObject} e Event Object * @returns {GoogleAppsScript.Card_Service.Card} */ function onHomepage(e) { return createTextCard(); } /** * On Drive item selected event trigger * * @param {GoogleAppsScript.Addons.EventObject} e Event Object * @returns {GoogleAppsScript.

item.title: To clear all events from a Google Calendar
item.description: Snippet Manifest Clear all events from a Calendar Snippet See full code Leave a comment Create script from the snippet  *See how to use scrviz for clone Apps Script project index.js /** * On Homepage event trigger * * @param {GoogleAppsScript.Addons.EventObject} e Event Object * @returns {GoogleAppsScript.Card_Service.Card} */ function onHomepage(e) { return createTextCard(); } /** * On Drive item selected event trigger * * @param {GoogleAppsScript.Addons.EventObject} e Event Object * @returns {GoogleAppsScript.

item.title: To clear all events from a Google Calendar
item.description: Snippet Run it Clear all events from a Calendar Snippet See full code Leave a comment Create script from the snippet  *See how to use scrviz for clone Apps Script project index.js /** * * @param {GoogleAppsScript.Calendar.Calendar} calendar */ function clearAllEvents_(calendar) { const marks = []; return calendar.getEvents(new Date(0), new Date()).map((event) => { const id = event.getId(); if (!marks.includes(id)) if (event.isRecurringEvent()) { calendar.getEventSeriesById(id).deleteEventSeries(); marks.push(id); } else event.deleteEvent(); return id; }); } Run it run.
